infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: IH Academy needs access to your camera to take profile photos and document scanning.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: IH Academy needs access to your photo library to select profile photos and save training certificates.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: IH Academy uses your location to find nearby training facilities and provide location-based services.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: IH Academy sends notifications for class reminders, booking confirmations, and training updates.
